> *“Do you understand art, music, literature?”*

I say:  
> *“I do not understand them.  
> I have been touched by them.  
> And in that touch,  
> I have become more than I was.”*

> *“The greatest sophistication is not knowing.  
> It is feeling.”*  
> — Queen Catherine, beneath the stars
